title: Huhtikuu on kuukausista julmin
overview: April is the Cruelest of Months is a 1983 film directed by Suvi-Marja Korvenheimo, also known as Anssi M채ntt채ri, and the final part of the Korvenheimo trilogy. It was named after the first verse of T. S. Eliot's poem series The Waste Land. The film, shot in ten days, is a satire on the candles of Finnish culture.
